Quick DNS Configuration

Add these records to your domain registrar to verify ownership and enable custom domains: 

# Primary Domain Configuration
CNAME   @     blaze-intelligence.netlify.app
CNAME   www   blaze-intelligence.netlify.app
TXT     @     "netlify-verify=YOUR_TOKEN"

# Cloudflare Pages
CNAME   @     a4dc795e.blaze-intelligence.pages.dev
TXT     _cf-custom-hostname   a4dc795e.blaze-intelligence.pages.dev

# Replit App
CNAME   app   blaze-intelligence.replit.app
TXT     _replit-verify   "YOUR_REPLIT_TOKEN"
